name: Reference Whitewater Ski Area Backcountry Ski Map and Guide
categories: Whitewater Ski Area Backcountry Ski Map and G
description: For backcountry skiiers and snowboarders This map taps into the experience and local knowledge of CAA professionals, ACMG/UIFMG members, and GIS technicians Explore the Whitewater Ski Area in Nelson, BC. Includes georeferenced route photographs, approach routes, avalanche terrain assessment scales, hut locations, and more.
